16377.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Ah <pc>! You've already surpassed
level 10 as a  Paladin! That's amazing!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16377.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「あっ　<pc>！
　もうレベル１０以上の　パラディンに
　なっているのだ！　すごいのだ～！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16377.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 앗, <pc>!
　벌써 레벨 10 이상의 팔라딘이 된 거야!?
　굉장한걸~!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16377.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>啊，<pc>！
你已经成为１０级以上的
圣骑士了！好厉害！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16377.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>啊，<pc>！
你已經成為等級１０級以上的
聖騎士了！好厲害啊～！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16378.en: <start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>Ah Zubo, you're just in time!<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16378.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「おおっ　ズーボー。
　いいところに来てくれた！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16378.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>: 오오, 즈보.
　마침 잘 왔다!<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16378.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>哦哦，兹博。
你来得正好！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16378.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>喔喔，茲博。
你來得正好！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16379.en:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>Will you accompany me?
I'm going to ask <pc> to take
Lord Magnus' dog for a walk.<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16379.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「お前も　一緒に行ってくれんか？
　<pc>に　マグナスさまの愛犬を
　散歩させる任務を　依頼したんだが……。<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16379.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>: 너도 함께 가 주겠느냐?
　<pc>에게 매그너스 님의 애견을
　산책시키는 임무를 부탁한 참이다만…….<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16379.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>你也一起去吧？
我委托了<pc>
带马格纳斯大人的爱犬散步……<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16379.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>你也一起去吧？
我委託了<pc>
帶馬格納斯大人的愛犬散步……<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16380.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Walking a dog? If that's the task then
just leave it to me!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16380.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「犬の散歩？
　それなら　オイラにも　まかせてほしいのだ！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16380.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 개 산책 말입니까?
　그럼 저도 함께 가겠습니다!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16380.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>遛狗？
请尽管交给我吧！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16380.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>遛狗？
這樣的話，請儘管交給我吧！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16381.en:
Lord Magnus' prized pooch is his finest friend. As you will be entrusted with the care of said prized pooch, you are expected to take great
care in walking him!
16381.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「この国の重鎮　マグナスさまの愛犬を
　おあずかりするのだから
　細心の注意を払って　散歩にあたるように！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16381.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>: 나라의 중진이신 매그너스 님의
　개를 돌보는 것이니
　최대한 조심해서 산책하도록!<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16381.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>马格纳斯大人是这个国家的重要人物，
带着他的爱犬散步时，
一定要多加小心！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16381.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>馬格納斯大人是這個國家的重要人物，
帶著他的愛犬散步時，
一定要多加小心！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16382.en:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>First, you must proceed upstairs to Magnus'
room to obtain the dog, Marii. Now, go and
let it be done!<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16382.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「まずは　２階の　マグナスさまの部屋へ
　愛犬マリーを　迎えにいってくれ。頼んだぞ！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16382.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>: 우선 2층에 있는 매그너스 님의 방으로
　애견 마리를 데리러 가라. 그럼 부탁하마!<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16382.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>先去２楼马格纳斯大人的房间，
迎接爱犬玛丽吧。拜托了！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16382.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>先去２樓馬格納斯大人的房間，
迎接愛犬瑪麗吧。拜託了！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16383.en:
. Lets go to Magnus' room. Take the stairs by the guardroom next door to get there. We shall obtain the beast and do
the deed as it is to be done!
16383.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「<pc>。マグナスさまの部屋へ行くには
　この部屋のとなりの　兵士詰所のそばにある
　階段を使うと　近いのだ。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16383.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 매그너스 님의 방은
　이 방 옆 병사대기소 근처의
　계단을 이용하면 금방 갈 수 있어.<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16383.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001><pc>。要想去马格纳斯大人的房间，
就去这个房间隔壁的士兵值班室，
由它旁边的楼梯上去吧，这样比较近。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16383.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001><pc>，要想去馬格納斯大人的房間，
就去這房間隔壁的士兵值班室，
從它旁邊的樓梯上去吧，這樣比較近。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16384.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001><pc> and I are headed to
Magnus' room. Lets go!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16384.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「オイラ　先に　マグナスさまの部屋に
　行っているのだ！
　<pc>も　来るのだ！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16384.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 그럼 난 먼저
　매그너스 님의 방에 가 있을게!
　<pc>도 빨리 와!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16384.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>我先到马格纳斯大人的
房间去了！
<pc>你也来吧！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16384.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>我先到馬格納斯大人的
房間去了！
<pc>你也來吧！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16385.en: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Ahhh, hold it!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16385.ja: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「あああっ　待つのだ！！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16385.ko: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 으아아, 기다려!!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16385.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>啊啊啊，等等！！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16385.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>啊啊啊，等一下！！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16386.en:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>Damn it! Marii ran off because
Zubo wasn't paying attention!<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16386.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>「もうっ！　ズーボーさんが
　ちゃんと見てないから　マリーちゃんが
　逃げちゃったじゃないですかっ！<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16386.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>: 아이참!
　즈보 씨가 한눈파는 바람에
　마리가 도망쳤잖아요!<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16386.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>真是的！
都怪兹博不好好看着，
玛丽跑掉了吧！<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16386.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>真是的！
都怪茲博沒有好好看著，
害瑪麗跑掉了啦！<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16387.en:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>If anything happens to Marii, We are in deep
shit, okay? Please, we can't let her get hurt!<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16387.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>「マリーちゃんに　何かあったら
　しかられるのは　私なんですからねっ！
　絶対に　ケガなんて　させないでくださいよっ！<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16387.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>: 마리한테 무슨 일이 생기면
　혼나는 사람은 저라고요!
　절대 다치게 하시면 안 돼요, 아셨죠!?<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16387.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>如果玛丽发生什么意外，
挨骂的人可是我啊！
绝对不要让它受伤！<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16387.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>如果瑪麗發生什麼意外，
挨罵的人可是我啊！
絕對不要傷到牠喔！<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16388.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Do not fret, Pichon!
We shall take care of this problem!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16388.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「だ…大丈夫なのだ　ピチョン！
　オイラたちに　まかせるのだ！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16388.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 거… 걱정 마, 피촌!
　우리만 믿어!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16388.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>没……没问题的，毕琼！
交给我们吧！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16388.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>沒……沒問題的，畢瓊！
交給我們吧！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16389.en: <start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>In that case, please do!<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16389.ja: <start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>「じゃあ　頼みましたからねっ！<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16389.ko: <start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>: 그럼 부탁할게요!<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16389.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>那就拜托你们了！<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16389.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>那就拜託你們了！<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16390.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Marii must have wanted to escape desperately
to disappear so quickly!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16390.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「あっという間に　消えるなんて　マリーちゃんは
　よっぽど　外に出たかったのだ！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16390.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 그 잠깐 사이에 빠져나가다니
　마리도 어지간히 밖에 나가고 싶었나 봐!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16390.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>一瞬间就不见踪影了，
玛丽看来很想出去玩呢！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16390.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>一瞬間就不見蹤影了，
瑪麗看來很想出去玩呢！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16391.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Go downstairs and ask the guards at the first
floor entrance if they have seen Marii running
around anywhere. <pc>, you must find Marii!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16391.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「マリーちゃんを　城の外へ出さないように
　１階の出入り口にいる衛兵に　頼んでくるのだ。
　<pc>は　マリーちゃんを探すのだ！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16391.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 난 마리가 성 밖으로 나가지 못하게
　1층 출입구에 있는 위병에게 부탁하고 올게.
　{pc}|hpp(은,는) 마리를 찾아봐 줘!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16391.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>为了防止玛丽跑出城外，
我去叫１楼出入口处的卫兵帮忙。
<pc>快去找玛丽。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16391.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>為了防止瑪麗跑出城外，
我去叫１樓出入口處的衛兵幫忙。
<pc>快去找瑪麗！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16392.en:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>What's wrong? If it's Marii, she
hasn't come back yet.<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16392.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>「どうしたの？　マリーちゃんなら
　まだ　帰ってきていませんよ。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16392.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>: 무슨 일이세요?
　마리는 아직 안 돌아왔는데.<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16392.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>怎么了？玛丽
还没有回来哦。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16392.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>怎麼了？
瑪麗還沒有回來喔。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16393.en:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>She's such an unruly pooch. Last time the
guards took her out for a walk she ran out of
town and disappeared for three days!<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16393.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>「あの子ったら　やんちゃで手がつけられないの。
　この前も　散歩中に逃げだして
　城下町の外まで　行っちゃったらしいし。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16393.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>: 마리도 참, 얼마나 장난꾸러기인지 몰라요.
　얼마 전에도 산책하다가 도망쳐서는
　시가지 밖까지 나갔다지 뭐예요.<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16393.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>那孩子太淘气了总是看不住呢。
前阵子也是，在散步途中跑掉，
好像都跑到城区外面去了。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16393.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>那孩子太淘氣了總是看不住呢。
前陣子也是，在散步途中跑掉，
好像都跑到城鎮外面去了。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16394.en:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>She's still Lord Magnus' favorite however.
He'd be devastated to lose her so please
find her and bring her back immediately!<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16394.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>「とにかく　早く　マリーちゃんを見つけて
　ちゃんと散歩させてきてくださいね！<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16394.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>: 아무튼 빨리 마리를 찾아서
　산책시켜 주세요!<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16394.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>总之，尽快找到玛丽，
带它去散步吧！<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16394.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>總之，盡快找到瑪麗，
帶牠去散步吧！<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16395.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Ha ha ha!
I'll get you Marii!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16395.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「はあはあ……。
　やっと　マリーちゃんを　捕まえたのだ！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16395.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 헉, 헉…….
　겨우 마리를 잡았어!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16395.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>呼呼……
总算抓到玛丽了！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16395.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>呼呼……
總算抓到瑪麗了！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16396.ja: <start_lip_sync n01440 _normal m00001>「わんっ　わんっ！<stop_lip_animation n01440 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16396.ko: <start_lip_sync n01440 _normal m00001>: 멍, 멍!<stop_lip_animation n01440 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16397.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Yeah? - Yeah. What's the matter,
Marii?<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16397.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「うん？
　どうしたのだ　マリーちゃん？<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16397.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 응?
　왜 그래, 마리?<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16397.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>嗯？
怎么了，玛丽？<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16397.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>嗯？
怎麼了，瑪麗？<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16398.ja: <start_lip_sync n01440 _normal m00001>「わんっ　わんっ　わんっ！<stop_lip_animation n01440 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16398.ko: <start_lip_sync n01440 _normal m00001>: 멍, 멍, 멍!<stop_lip_animation n01440 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16399.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Oh I see! She wants to run!
All right! Then let's play chase!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16399.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「そうか！
　マリーちゃんは　いっぱい　走りたいのだな！
　ようし！　じゃあ　追いかけっこするのだ！！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16399.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 그래!
　마리는 신나게 달리고 싶은 거구나!?
　좋아! 그럼 술래잡기하자!!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16399.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>这样啊！
玛丽想尽情奔跑呢！
好！我们来赛跑吧！！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16399.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>這樣啊！
瑪麗想盡情奔跑啊！
好！我們來賽跑吧！！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16400.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001><pc>! You must hurry to the
Gilzad Region! Run southeast along the road
and down the hill!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16400.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「<pc>！
　ギルザッド地方まで　競争するのだ！！
　この坂を下りて　道沿いに　南東へ走るのだ！！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16400.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: <pc>! 길자드 지방까지
　누가 더 빨리 도착하나 대결하자!!
　언덕 밑의 길을 따라 남동쪽으로 달리는 거야!!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16400.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001><pc>！
我们赛跑到基尔扎德地区吧！！
走下这个坡，沿路向东南跑！！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16400.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001><pc>！
我們賽跑到基爾札德地方吧！！
走下這個坡，沿路朝著東南方跑！！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16401.en:
<start_lip_sync n01440 _normal m00001>Kikiki.
Ki ki ki.<stop_lip_animation n01440 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16401.ja: <start_lip_sync n01440 _normal m00001>「く～ん　く～ん。<stop_lip_animation n01440 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16401.ko: <start_lip_sync n01440 _normal m00001>: 끄응~ 끄응~<stop_lip_animation n01440 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16402.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Ugh... I'm getting tired of 
<pc> always beating me to the punch.<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16402.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「はあはあ……　くたびれたのだ。
　先に　着いてるとは
　さすが　<pc>なのだ。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16402.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 헉, 헉…… 죽겠네.
　먼저 도착하다니 역시 {pc}|hpp(이야,야).<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16402.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>呼呼……累死我了。
你居然先到了，
<pc>真厉害。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16402.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>呼呼……累死我了。
你居然先到了，
<pc>真厲害。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16403.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Marii looks happy! She must have just
wanted to get out of the castle and visit
her friends here.<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16403.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「マリーちゃん　とっても　楽しそうなのだ！
　きっと　ここに友達がいるから
　城の外に　出たかったのだ。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16403.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 마리, 정말 즐거워 보이는걸!
　아마도 여기에 친구가 있어서
　성 밖으로 나오고 싶었던 모양이야.<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16403.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>玛丽看起来很开心呢！
肯定是因为这里有它的朋友
所以才想出城呢。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16403.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>瑪麗看起來很開心呢！
肯定是因為這裡有牠的朋友，
所以才想出城的吧。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16404.ja: <start_lip_sync n01440 _normal m00001>「わんっ　わんっ！<stop_lip_animation n01440 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16404.ko: <start_lip_sync n01440 _normal m00001>: 멍, 멍!<stop_lip_animation n01440 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16405.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Hmm... Now it's like she wants to go home.
Maybe she's had enough of visiting with her
friends now!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16405.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「帰りたいって　言ってるみたいなのだ。
　きっと　満足したのだ！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16405.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 돌아가고 싶은 것 같은데.
　이제 만족했나 봐!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16405.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>玛丽似乎是在说想回去。
肯定已经心满意足了！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16405.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>瑪麗似乎是在說想回去。
肯定已經心滿意足了！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16406.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Ok Marii. If you ever want to come here
to visit your friends again, I can bring you
anytime.<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16406.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「マリーちゃん。
　ここに来たければ　オイラが　いつでも
　連れてきてあげるのだ。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16406.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 마리, 여기 오고 싶으면
　내가 언제든지 데려와 줄게.<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16406.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>玛丽。
想来这里的话，
我会随时带你来的。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16406.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>瑪麗。
想來這裡的話，
我會隨時帶你來的。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16407.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>That's why you shouldn't come alone.
If you were to get attacked by a monster and
seriously hurt, Lord Magnus would be shattered.<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16407.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「だから　ひとりで来ちゃいけないのだ。
　魔物に襲われて　ケガでもしたら
　マグナスさまが　悲しむのだ。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16407.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 그러니까 이제 혼자 나오면 안 돼.
　마물에게 공격당해서 다치기라도 하면
　매그너스 님이 슬퍼하실 테니까.<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16407.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>所以不要独自跑来哦。
被怪物袭击受伤了的话，
马格纳斯大人会伤心的。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16407.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>所以不要獨自跑來喔。
要是被怪物襲擊受了傷，
馬格納斯大人會傷心的。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16409.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>All right, all right.
Let's all return to Gartland Castle!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16409.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「よしよし……　わかってくれれば　いいのだ。
　さあ　ガートラント城に　帰ろうなのだ！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16409.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 그래, 착하지…… 알았으면 됐어.
　자, 가트란트성으로 돌아가자!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16409.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>乖乖……知道就好啦。
回到加特兰德城去吧！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16409.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>乖乖……知道就好啦。
回到加特蘭德城去吧！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16410.ja: <start_lip_sync n01440 _normal m00001>「わんっ　わんっ！<stop_lip_animation n01440 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16410.ko: <start_lip_sync n01440 _normal m00001>: 멍, 멍!<stop_lip_animation n01440 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16411.en: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Ahhhh, Marii, you're as vibrant as ever!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16411.ja: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「あああっ　マリーちゃん……　まだ元気なのだ！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16411.ko: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 으아아, 마리…… 아직 기운이 넘치네!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16411.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>啊啊啊，玛丽……还精力十足呢！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16411.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>啊啊啊，瑪麗……還精力十足呢！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16412.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>All right! I'll race you to Magnus' room!
<pc>, what are you waiting for?
Don't be late!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16412.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「ようし！
　マグナスさまの部屋まで　競争するのだ！
　<pc>も　遅れちゃダメなのだ！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16412.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 좋았어!
　매그너스 님의 방까지 경주하자!
　<pc>도 뒤처지지 마!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16412.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>好！
我们赛跑到马格纳斯大人的房间！
<pc>也不要落下！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16412.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>好！
我們賽跑到馬格納斯大人的房間！
<pc>也不要落後囉！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16413.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Ha ha ha. It's been a long time since
I ran this much.<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16413.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「はあはあ……。こんなに
　たっぷり走ったのは　ひさしぶりなのだ。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16413.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 헉, 헉……. 이렇게 열심히 달린 게
　얼마 만인지 모르겠군.<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16413.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>呼呼……好久没有
像这样尽情地奔跑了。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16413.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>呼呼……好久沒有
像這樣盡情地奔跑了。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16414.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Come on, <pc>!
Let's return Marii together.<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16414.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「<pc>！
　一緒に　マリーちゃんを　返そうなのだ。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16414.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: <pc>!
　같이 마리를 돌려주러 가자.<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16414.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001><pc>！
和我一起将玛丽还回去吧。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16414.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001><pc>！
我們一起將瑪麗送回去吧。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16415.en: <start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>Oh, welcome back.<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16415.ja: <start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>「あらっ　おかえりなさい。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16415.ko: <start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>: 어머, 어서 오세요.<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16415.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>哎呀，欢迎回来。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16415.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>哎呀，歡迎回來。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16416.en:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>I can't believe Marii sleeps so peacefully.
You must have taken her on a long walk.<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16416.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>「マリーちゃんが　あんなに　素直に寝るなんて。
　あなたたち　よほど　たくさん
　マリーちゃんを　散歩させてくれたのねっ。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16416.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>: 마리가 저렇게 얌전히 잠들다니.
　두 분이 마리를 어지간히
　열심히 산책시키셨나 보네요.<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16416.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>玛丽居然会如此老实去睡觉。
看来你们带玛丽
走了很远呢。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16416.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>瑪麗居然會如此老實去睡覺。
看來你們帶瑪麗
走了很遠呢。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16417.en: <start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>Thank you so much for looking after her!<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16417.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>「いつもなら　部屋で　もう　ひとあばれ
　されるところだったから　助かっちゃった。
　本当に　ありがとうっ！<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16417.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>: 평소 같으면 방에서도
　한바탕 뛰고 잠들거든요.
　덕분에 살았어요. 정말 고마워요!<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16417.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>往常回到房间里，
都要再闹一阵的，
你们帮上大忙了，谢谢！<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16417.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>往常回到房間裡
都會再鬧上一陣的，
你們幫上大忙了，謝謝！<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16418.en:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>Please accept my thanks for this good deed.
Commander Strong has a reward for you.<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16418.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>「散歩のお礼は　ストロング団長から
　受け取ってくださいね。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16418.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>: 산책의 답례는
　스트롱 단장님께 받으세요.<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16418.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>散步的谢礼
就找斯特伦格团长要吧。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16418.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>散步的謝禮
請去找史特隆團長拿吧。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16419.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Both Marii and Pichon were very pleased!
It makes me happy to be appreciated by
someone!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16419.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「マリーちゃんも　ピチョンも
　とっても　よろこんでくれたのだ！　誰かに
　よろこんでもらえるって　うれしいのだ！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16419.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 마리도, 피촌도 무척 기뻐 보였어!
　다른 사람이 기뻐하는 걸 보면
　내가 다 뿌듯하다니까!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16419.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>玛丽和毕琼都很开心！
能让别人开心，
我觉得非常高兴！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16419.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>瑪麗和畢瓊都很開心！
能讓別人開心，
我覺得非常高興！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16420.en: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Now go and report to Commander Strong!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16420.ja: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「さあ　ストロング団長に　報告に行くのだ！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16420.ko: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 자, 스트롱 단장님께 보고하러 가자!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16420.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>好啦，去向斯特伦格团长报告吧！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16420.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>好啦，去向史特隆團長報告吧！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
